title: Company Backed by J.D. Vance Gives Platform for Russian Propaganda
description: An interview of captive Americans done “under duress” appears on a web platform backed by J.D. Vance and Peter Thiel.
dc:creator: Danny Hakim
category: Hillbilly Elegy: A Memoir of a Family and Culture in Crisis (Book)
media:credit: Maddie McGarvey for The New York Times
media:description: A campaign event in Beavercreek, Ohio. J.D. Vance, a Republican author and venture capitalist, is running for Senate.
